channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Luigi Mangione trial is all about narrative control
item.description: On Monday, several dozen members of the public are lined up outside 100 Centre Street in Lower Manhattan, hoping to squeeze into the courtroom to hear testimony from witnesses called by the state against Luigi Mangione - the man accused of shooting and killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson a year ago. Despite the endless news […]

item.title: Sous pression de Google et de Gemini 3, OpenAI lancerait une grosse mise à jour pour ChatGPT très vite
item.description: Sam Altman, le patron d'OpenAI, a secoué ses troupes il y a quelques jours en activant un « code rouge ». Première conséquence concrète : GPT-5.2 pourrait être lancé très prochainement, dès la semaine prochaine en fait, pour mieux concurrencer Gemini 3.

item.title: Experts warn this 'worst case scenario' React vulnerability could soon be exploited - so patch now
item.description: React patches a 10/10 flaw that can be used for remote code execution.

item.title: AWS re:Invent was an all-in pitch for AI. Customers might not be ready.
item.description: AWS is releasing a lot of new AI tech but the cloud infrastructure giant's enterprise customers may not be ready for it yet.

item.title: Sci-Fi Is Already Making a Good Showing This Awards Season
item.description: 'Bugonia,' 'Frankenstein,' 'Sinners', and 'Wicked For Good' are already racking up the nominations.

item.title: I can't believe these Black Friday Apple deals are still live – AirPods, Apple Watch, MacBooks, and more
item.description: You can still score record-low Black Friday prices on Apple devices, and I'm rounding up the 11 best, including AirPods, iPads, the Apple Watch, MacBooks, and more.

item.title: Elon Musk Slapped With $140 Million Fine Over Deceptive Blue Checks on X
item.description: The fine would put a big dent in one Musk's only revenue-generating moves after taking over Twitter.

item.title: 9 Best Lubes (2025): Water-Based, Silicone, Natural Oils
item.description: For the most sensitive parts of the human body, friction is the enemy. Here’s how to keep it at bay with our favorite lubes made of water, silicone, or natural oil.

item.title: EU launches antitrust investigation into Meta’s WhatsApp AI access policy
item.description: Europe (and Italy) is worried about WhatsApp’s AI policy and its effects on competition.

item.title: PS5 Pro : vos jeux seraient encore plus beaux en 2026 grâce à cet « énorme » coup de pouce logiciel
item.description: Sony préparerait une mise à jour majeure de sa technologie d'upscaling par IA, le PSSR, pour la PS5 Pro en 2026. Selon la chaîne YouTube Moore’s Law is Dead, cette nouvelle version, nommée PSSR 2, promet d'améliorer le visuel de nos jeux, mais aussi d'alléger les ressources nécessaires à leur exécution.

item.title: This Alienware Aurora desktop packs incredible speed and power with the cheapest RTX 5080 anywhere - and it has $730 off right now
item.description: The Alienware Aurora Desktop PC is an unbelievable bargain right now, with a huge $730 saving.

item.title: Treasury fines N.Y. property management firm $7.1 million over ties to Putin’s ally
item.description: Gracetown Inc. had received 24 payments between April 2018 and May 2020 totaling $31,250 on behalf of a company owned by the Russian oligarch. The U.S. Treasury Department imposed a $7.1 million fine on a New York-based property management firm Thursday, accusing it of violating sanctions by managing luxury real estate properties for oligarch Oleg Deripaska, who has close ties to Russian President Vladimir Putin....

item.title: New research reveals older users less likely to find AI useful
item.description: Cisco says we need to focus on giving everyone AI skills and opportunities, not just rolling it out quickly.

item.title: Trump replaces head architect after clashing over ‘big, beautiful’ White House ballroom
item.description: Shalom Baranes will take over the ballroom construction after the Trump administration parted ways with the original architect. It’s been less than two months since President Trump began his demolition of the White House’s East Wing to make room for his “big, beautiful White House Ballroom,” and the President is already parting ways with the original architect behind the project....

item.title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
item.description: As a technology, eSIM has been around for a decade now. However, global eSIM adoption was around 3% last year and will only cross 5% this year. Despite these figures, analysts, eSIM-providing startups, and investors are bullish about eSIM’s upward trajectory, largely thanks to travel. Device compatibility One of the key factors for that is […]

item.title: New ‘KnoWay’ robotaxis cause chaos in upcoming Grand Theft Auto Online DLC
item.description: The inclusion of the Waymo look-a-likes appears to be part of a larger storyline that will encourage players to "stop the development of a mass surveillance network."

item.title: État d’urgence chez ChatGPT : sortie imminente de la version GPT 5.2 pour répondre à Google
item.description: En panique, OpenAI s'apprêterait dès la semaine prochaine à lancer GPT 5.2 pour répondre à Gemini 3.

item.title: Mi-moniteur, mi-Smart TV, cet écran PC LG ultra-wide (21:9) de 34 pouces animé par webOS chute sous les 300 €
item.description: Avec sa dalle ultra-large et son système webOS, l'écran PC LG Smart Monitor 34U601SA-W peut aussi bien être utilisé pour travailler que pour les moments de détente. Actuellement, Amazon le propose à 299,95 euros au lieu de 379,99 euros.

item.title: Netflix is buying Warner Bros: All of the latest updates
item.description: After a bidding war that reportedly also involved Paramount, Comcast, Amazon, and Apple, on December 5th, Netflix struck a deal to buy Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion, buying the studio, HBO / HBO Max, Warner Games, and more, while leaving cable and sports assets, including CNN, TNT Sports, and the Discovery channels out. There are […]

item.title: La France abat 5 drones au-dessus d’une base nucléaire ultra-sensible
item.description: Un essaim de drones non identifiés a survolé la base nucléaire de l’Île Longue, près de Brest. La Marine a promptement réagi en abattant les cinq engins. Une enquête a été ouverte.

item.title: Was 2025 Marvel’s Comeback Year?
item.description: With 'Thunderbolts,' 'Daredevil,' and more spread throughout 2025, Marvel sure had a bigger year than before. But was it a better one?

item.title: Wired Earbuds Are Making Phone Dongles a Good Thing
item.description: If you're an audiophile, dongles might be your new best friend.

item.title: OpenAI’s GPT-5.2 ‘code red’ response to Google is coming next week
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman declared a "code red" situation earlier this week, pushing staff to respond quickly to increased competition from Google and Anthropic. Sources familiar with OpenAI's plans tell me that the company is planning its first response to Gemini 3 with its upcoming GPT-5.2 update. I understand GPT-5.2 is ready to be released, […]

item.title: New streaming channel launches to give viewers a peek into city council meetings
item.description: Hamlet TV is a way to help keep citizens informed of what's happening inside local governments.

item.title: Eternity's director says it 'doesn't matter' if you disagree with the new A24 film's ending, but I still can't stand it
item.description: New A24 movie Eternity is the ultimate afterlife love triangle – but if you don’t agree with the ending, it ‘doesn’t matter’ to the director.

item.title: US security agency urges Android and iPhone users to stop using personal VPNs
item.description: CISA warned that many commercial VPNs could be putting your data at greater risk. But that doesn't mean you should give up on privacy – here's what you need to know.

item.title: Chat Control: EU Commissioner backs Parliament line on targeted monitoring
item.description: As the trialogue negotiations are set to begin on Tuesday, December 9, the debate on the controversial Child Sexual Abuse Regulation (CSAR) flares up.

item.title: Discord just dropped its first personalized year-in-review—and it looks a lot like Spotify Wrapped
item.description: The long-requested feature shows your messages, emojis, voice minutes, top servers, and one of 10 personality-style Checkpoint cards. The year is quickly coming to an end, and that means tech platforms are tripping over themselves to roll out their year-end recaps—all hoping to capture the virality that Spotify’s Wrapped year-in-review recap commands each year....

item.title: I thought I was tired. Turns out, I was burnt out
item.description: When your brain is cooked not even a vacation will get you right. Being tired is practically a personality trait in corporate America—especially in 2025. Everybody is exhausted, it seems. Folks are doing fiftyleven jobs. You’re always juggling tasks, always late for the next meeting because the last one ran long. But when you’re one of the few Black employees at the gig, there’s a subconscious fear of looking like you’re in over your head, especially with the looming fear of layoffs. So you push through, even when you’re running on fumes. You go harder, telling yourself you’ll rest once you ge...

item.title: Wikipedia is getting in on the yearly wrapped game
item.description: Everyone is doing it, so why not Wikipedia? Everyone’s favorite free online encyclopedia has decided to launch its own customized Year in Review feature on its mobile app. Of course, you’ll need the app installed and have been using it for the feature to be of much use. But clearly, the Wikimedia Foundation hopes this […]

item.title: The PS5 Could Receive a Massive AI Upgrade for Games
item.description: And it’s making us even more excited for the rumored PlayStation 6 handheld.

item.title: Snag a Google Pixel 10 for its lowest price yet
item.description: As of Dec. 5, get the Google Pixel 10 for its lowest price yet at Amazon.

item.title: Amazon has a huge holiday sale with Black Friday prices – AirPods, coffee makers, PS5 and more
item.description: Amazon has a huge holiday sale with leftover Black Friday prices, and I'm rounding up the 31 best deals featuring AirPods, coffee makers, PS5, and more.

item.title: The best Christmas gifts we love under $50
item.description: One of the easiest things to do during the holidays is spend too much money. It happens to many of us, even when we swear that things are going to be different this year. We want to help you stay true to your intentions to save money when possible, and we're doing that with a […]
